ygData.subject: Re: Denied Access?
ygData.msgSnippet: vampiric embrace isnt worthless its boosts AC magic and a few other fields its a screwed up lifetap that you cast on yourself and it works like a shield ...
ygData.messageBody:
vampiric embrace isnt worthless its boosts AC magic and a few other fields

its a screwed up lifetap that you cast on yourself and it works like a
shield

----- Original Message -----
From: Munk <Munk@...>
To: <EverQuest@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, April 14, 1999 6:41 PM
Subject: [EverQuest] Re: Denied Access?


> From: "Munk" <Munk@...>
>
> NO!!!! its a broken spell... my friend bought it and now regrets it...
there
> are a few others he warned me not to get... as soon as i talk to him next
> ill pass along the list
>
> Nafertina lvl 7 dark elf [Tunare]
>
>
> >From: "Wombat (Adam Abell)" <wombat11@...>
> >
> >Half elven scum! Like they would block a race from a mailing list...
cmon

the
> >spells, and which spells are a waste of money? Take vampiric embrace...
is

> >
> >Thanks,

> >Wombat / Dark Elven Necromancer
